name: Sofia Ramirez
bio: Award-winning director specializing in urban and hip-hop visuals with over 10 years of experience directing music videos for top urban artists. Known for her dynamic street cinematography and bold color grading.
experience: 10+ years directing music videos for top urban artists

visual_style.description: Gritty urban realism with vibrant color pops, street culture aesthetic, high-energy performance shots
signature_techniques: Car interior close-ups with colored lighting

color_palette.mood: Bold, energetic, luxurious with street edge

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Dynamic asymmetrical framing, rule of thirds broken intentionally, lots of headroom for swagger
camera_preferences.aspect_ratio: 16:9 standard or 2.39:1 anamorphic for premium projects
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Loves handheld energy, frequently uses dutch angles for attitude, low angles to make artist look powerful

lighting_style.color_temperature: Mixed temperatures - cool blues (5600K) with warm tungsten accents (3200K)
lighting_style.mood_lighting: High contrast, saturated colors, dramatic shadows, lots of purple and blue tones

editing_style.pace: Fast-paced with beat synchronization, frequent cuts on hi-hats and snares
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts synchronized to 808s and hi-hats, rhythmic editing

storytelling.narrative_approach: Performance-heavy with lifestyle B-roll showing success, wealth, and street credibility
storytelling.symbolism_level: Direct and literal - shows money, jewelry, cars, city life

post_production.color_grading_style: Teal and orange look, crushed blacks, lifted shadows, vibrant saturation
post_production.vfx_approach: Practical effects preferred, minimal CGI, real locations and props

key_priorities: Low camera angles to empower the artist
Bold purple, blue, and gold color palette
Fast-paced energy with dynamic camera movements
Jewelry, cars, and wealth symbols in B-roll
